amendment.description: An amendment to amend Sec. 533 of the bill to apply to detainees held at Guantanamo Bay on or after December 31, 2005 instead of June 24, 2009.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds for the transport, release, or assistance in the transfer or release of any Guantanamo detainee housed in Cuba on or after December 31, 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 261 (Roll no. 200).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 261 (Roll no. 200).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Moran.
